attributes.action: Knighthood for Captain Tom Moore for charity fundraising during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: He is an inspiration to the nation and brought a true sense of national pride to the fore during truly unprecedented times
attributes.background: Knight Captain Jon Moore for charity work and lifting the nations moral during the Covid-19

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
